definitions.title: vb. denom.
definitions.body: utter a prophecy, speak as prophet;—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיִּנְאֲמוּ]] [[נְאֻם]] Je 23:31 and they uttered (in the prophetic manner), it as an utterance (of ´[[י]]); they used the prophetic formula (cf. ´[[אׂמְרִים נְאֻם י]] Ez Eze 13:6, Eze 13:7).
